ja.approximator.settings.max_knots: 最大節点数(曲線の分割最大数)
ja.approximator.settings.max_knots.desc: 曲線近似時に分割できる最大の節点（分割点）の数です。
ja.approximator.settings.error_threshold.de: 曲線近似の許容誤差です。低い値にすると元の曲線に忠実な近似になりますが、複雑なパスになります。
ja.approximator.settings.sampling_rate.desc: 描画時の点のサンプリング間隔です。大きい値にすると点の数が減り、処理が軽くなりますが精度は下がります。
ja.curve.knot_slider.label: 節点数:
ja.approximator_alert.title: 近似できません
ja.approximator_alert.message.1: 曲線が一価関数ではありません。
ja.approximator_alert.message.2: 左から右へ一方向に描いてください。
ja.approximator_alert.message.3: 表現できない曲線例: 円やらせん状の曲線
ja.approximator_alert.advanced: 拡張モードを有効にする
ja.approximator_alert.advanced_mode_message: 拡張モードは現在開発中です。
ja.approximator_alert.dont_show_again: 今後このメッセージを表示しない
ja.alert.approximation_failed: 近似処理に失敗しました

ja.menu.cache_notice: 注意：キャッシュ削除で表示中のグラフデータは消去されます（データ自体は残ります）
ja.menu.save_notice: 注意：保存直後はデータが一時保存されており、まだ確定していません。

en.tutorial.steps.0.title: Draw a Line
en.tutorial.steps.0.description: Try drawing freely with the pen tool.

en.tutorial.steps.1.description: Check the formula of the curve you drew.

en.pen_panel.title: Pen Settings
en.pen_panel.palette.delete_mode: Palette Delete Mode: Click × on the color you want to remove
en.settings_panel.title: Graph Settings
en.export_panel.title: Export Graph
en.approximator.title: Curve Approximation Settings
en.approximator.display.title: Default Curve Approximation Display Settings
en.approximator.settings.max_knots: Max number of knots (max curve segments)
en.approximator.settings.max_knots.desc: The maximum number of knots (segments) allowed when approximating a curve.
en.approximator.settings.error_threshold.de: Tolerance for curve approximation. Lower values make the approximation closer to the original curve but more complex.
en.approximator.settings.sampling_rate.desc: Point sampling interval when drawing. Higher values reduce the number of points and lighten processing, but decrease accuracy.
en.curve.knot_slider.label: Knots:
en.approximator_alert.title: Curve Approximation Alert
en.approximator_alert.message.1: The curve is not a univalent function.
en.approximator_alert.message.2: Draw in one direction from left to right.
en.approximator_alert.message.3: Examples of curves that cannot be represented: Circles and spirals
en.approximator_alert.advanced_mode_message: Extended mode is currently under development.
en.approximator_alert.dont_show_again: Do not display this message in the future
en.delete_mode.notification: Delete mode: Click the × button of the curve you want to delete.
en.menu.delete_confirmation:
Are you sure you want to delete this graph?
This action cannot be undone.
en.menu.cache_notice: Note: Clearing cache will remove displayed graph data (actual data will be preserved)
en.menu.save_notice: Note: Immediately after saving, the data is temporarily stored and not yet finalized.
en.save_graph.title: Save Graph
